name: Myles Colligan
title: Software Engineer
description: The easy way has never appealed to me, I've always been drawn to the challenging things. Whether the challenge be riding dirt bikes across Chile and getting lost in nature or using creative problem solving to create a complex full stack app......The challenge is where I thrive.  I am a life long learner. This is why I am a software engineer. Where in order to stay relevant you are required to constantly challenge yourself, be curious and Learn. Habitually growing both personally and professionally.
